00017 static void
00018 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_DisplayFFT(CuTest* tc)
00019 {
00020         FIBITMAP *fft_dib, *real_dib, *log_dib;
00021         char *file = IMAGE_DIR "\\colour_lines.png";
00022                 
00023         FIBITMAP *dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file);      
00024         FIBITMAP *greyscale_dib = FreeImage_ConvertToGreyscale(dib);
00025 
00026         ProfileStart("FFT");
00027 
00028         fft_dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_FFT(greyscale_dib, 0, 1);  
00029 
00030         real_dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_ConvertComplexImageToAbsoluteValued(fft_dib);
00031 
00032         log_dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_Log(real_dib);
00033 
00034         FreeImageAlgorithms_SaveFIBToFile(log_dib, TEMP_DIR "\\fft.bmp", BIT8);
00035 
00036         ProfileStop("FFT");
00037 
00038         ProfilePrint();
00039 
00040         FreeImage_Unload(dib);
00041         FreeImage_Unload(greyscale_dib);
00042         FreeImage_Unload(real_dib);
00043         FreeImage_Unload(fft_dib);
00044         FreeImage_Unload(log_dib);
00045 }

00095 static void
00096 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_KissTest(CuTest* tc)
00097 {
00098         kiss_fftnd_cfg st;
00099         kiss_fft_cpx* fftbuf;
00100         kiss_fft_cpx* fftoutbuf;
00101 
00102         BYTE* bits;
00103         FICOMPLEX *complex_bits;
00104         int x, y;
00105 
00106         FIBITMAP *dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(IMAGE_DIR "\\FFTTest.bmp");
00107         FIBITMAP *float_dib = FreeImage_ConvertToType(dib, FIT_FLOAT, 0);
00108 
00109         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(float_dib);
00110         int height = FreeImage_GetWidth(float_dib);
00111 
00112         for(y = height - 1; y >= 0; y--) { 
00113                 
00114                 bits = FreeImage_GetScanLine(float_dib, y);
00115                 
00116                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)
00117                         printf ("%d, ", bits[x]);
00118 
00119                 printf ("\n");
00120         }
00121 
00122         printf("\n");
00123 
00124         FIBITMAP *fft = FreeImageAlgorithms_FFT(float_dib, 0, 0);  
00125 
00126         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00127                 
00128                 complex_bits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(fft, y);
00129                 
00130                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)
00131                         printf ("%0.1f %0.1fi, ", (float) complex_bits[x].r, (float) complex_bits[x].i);
00132 
00133                 printf ("\n");
00134         }
00135 
00136         FreeImage_Unload(float_dib);
00137         FreeImage_Unload(dib);
00138         FreeImage_Unload(fft);
00139 }
